instructions.title: How To Delete Your Yelp Account
instructions.before: Deleting your Yelp account is easy.  All you need to do is click on the delete link below from your computer browser.

qnAnswers.question: How do I delete my Yelp Business Account?
qnAnswers.answer: You will need to contact Yelp Customer Service about cancelling ads and closing your business account.  [Click here for more information] (https://www.yelp-support.com/article/How-do-I-close-my-account?l=en_US).

qnAnswers.question: I forgot my Yelp password.  What do I do?
qnAnswers.answer: [Click here for more information on how to reset your password] (https://www.yelp-support.com/article/How-do-I-change-the-password-for-my-user-account?l=en_US)

steps: [Click on the Yelp Delete Link] (https://www.yelp.com/support/contact/account_closure).  Type a Deletion Request and Click Send.
You will receive an email confirmation.  Click on the link in your email to confirm deletion.

slides.alt: Yelp-Delete Account from Website. Step 1: [Click on the Yelp Delete Link] (https://www.yelp.com/support/contact/account_closure).  Type a Deletion Request and Click Send.
